short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Foxhole tool that connects to FoxholeHQ to get the latest Foxhole Statistics and War Information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension takes data from the FoxholeHQ website and displays it with a click of a button showing the current Foxhole statistics such as current victory points, current amount of storm cannons, intel centers, and nukes for each side. This extension also provides information about the current war, total deaths for both sides, when the war started, and the winner of the war.

Extension updates every 10 minutes, if you'd like faster refresh rates the interactive map on FoxholeHQ provides updates every 15 seconds.
